summary: Restore the previous e-commerce product flow (product detail → add to cart → customer form → Stripe real payment → thank you/order confirmed → track order) and fix 'Not Found' errors when clicking products.
architectural_notes: Payment provider decision: use Stripe for real payments (Razorpay not supported on the current platform).
known_issues: Clicking products in the product list currently opens a 'Not Found' page; previously product detail and checkout flow worked.

existing_features.title: Fix the 'Explore Our Work' product grid so that clicking a product navigates to an existing product detail route instead of a missing route (currently the product grid navigates to '/business-card', '/logo-design', '/product-banner', '/photo-frame' but the router defines '/products/business-card', '/products/logo-design', '/products/product-banner', '/products/photo-frame').

Restore the end-to-end purchase flow for each product to match the previous behavior: product detail (including sample selection) → add to cart → customer form submission → payment step → thank you/order confirmed experience → 'Track My Order' for the created order.
Replace the current demo payment behavior on the Payment page with real Stripe payment initiation so users can complete an actual payment for the order (no fake/simulated payment).

Update the post-payment success experience so it reflects real Stripe payment completion: only show 'payment received/confirmed' messaging after Stripe verification succeeds, then transition the order into the correct paid/confirmed state and keep the 'Explore Home' and 'Track My Order' actions working.

Create and wire an explicit Order Confirmation page (currently empty) into the router and checkout flow, so that the user has a dedicated thank-you/order-confirmed screen reachable only after completing the payment step.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix product clicks opening 'Not Found' by restoring working product detail routes/pages
Restore the full pre-existing purchase flow (product sample/detail → add to cart → customer form → payment → order confirmed/thank you → track order)
Implement and enable real Stripe payments (not fake/simulated) in the checkout flow

Implement backend support for Stripe payments needed by the frontend payment step, including admin-only configuration for Stripe credentials and server-side creation/verification of the Stripe payment session for an order.

projectName: Restore product click routes and full checkout flow with real Stripe payment
